amendment.description: To clarify the prohibition on contracting with corporate expatriates.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1376 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1376 proposed by Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S9868-9869; text: CR S9868) To clarify the prohibition on contracting with corporate expatriates.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1376 proposed by Senator Levin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1376 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
